attributes.action: face David Davis in the Haltemprice and Howden by-election to allow Britsh people a say on the 42 day detention law
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
David Davis has said he wants to "take a stand" against the overnment's "slow strangulation of fundamental British freedoms".

Bottom line is we are having our civil liberties taken away from us.  Any of us can be arrested and held for 42 days without charge with this new law.

The terrorists have won.  With every liberty removed from us they score another victory.  We need to stand up and fight for our rights.  Prove we are not cowards scared to go about our daily lives.  Just as we have always done through history.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
